CustomField.description: Displays the colour associated with the given impact rating.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( TEXT(Impact__c) ) , IMAGE("/apex/grc__RatingDisplay", '' , 25, 80) , IMAGE("/apex/grc__RatingDisplay?colour=%23" + IF( ISPICKVAL( Impact__c, 'Low' ), '33CC00' , IF(ISPICKVAL( Impact__c, 'Medium' ), 'FF9900' , IF(ISPICKVAL( Impact__c, 'High' ) , 'FF0000', '') ) ) , TEXT(Impact__c) , 25, 80) )
CustomField.label: Impact Rating
